<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">

        <module/>
        <number>SNSCRIPT0001162</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>var vDate = new Date();
gs.print(vDate);
gs.print(formDate(vDate));
 
function formDate(d){
return '' + d.getFullYear() + '/' + pad(d.getMonth()) + '/' + pad(d.getDate());
}
 
function pad(digit){
if (digit < 10)
return '0' + digit;
return digit;
}
 
 
output:
*** Script: Mon Aug 06 2012 01:01:08 GMT-0700 (PDT)
*** Script: 2012/07/06
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type/>
        <short_description>Formating Date and Time Fields</short_description>
